entities.label: Case 0462/04 - Bribery and Favouritism in Procurement
United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo
2/1999 Section 4.3.2 - Avoidance of Conflicts of Interest and Corruption
2/1999 Section 23.9 - Examination and Evaluation of Tenders

edges.label: 1. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK conducted the investigation on bribery and favoritism in procurement at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 2. Reported By
edges.tooltip: The Kosovo Trust Agency's Internal Audit Unit reported the allegations leading to the investigation.

edges.label: 3. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The investigation focused on procurement processes at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 4. Allegations Against
edges.tooltip: Procurement Officer 1 was alleged to have accepted bribes and shown favoritism.

edges.label: 5. Allegations Against
edges.tooltip: Finance Officer was alleged to have accepted bribes.

edges.label: 6. Complainant
edges.tooltip: Vendor 1 Manager filed a complaint leading to the investigation.

edges.label: 7. Alleged Beneficiary
edges.tooltip: Vendor 2 was allegedly favored in the procurement process.

edges.label: 8. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Article 343 regarding accepting bribes.

edges.label: 9. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Article 344 regarding giving bribes.

edges.label: 10. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Section 4.3.2 regarding conflicts of interest and corruption.

edges.label: 11. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Section 4.1 regarding full and fair competition.

edges.label: 12. Applicable Law
edges.tooltip: The investigation considered potential violations of Section 23.9 regarding examination and evaluation of tenders.

Procurement Officer 1: Allegedly favored Vendor 2 in the tender process.
Allegedly replaced a Bid Evaluation Committee member.
Inappropriately included the Finance Officer in the Bid Evaluation Committee.
